name: Lunarvaders
description:
Oh, no!  There are enemy ships invading our lunar base!  They are coming to us just for fuel!  However, it's not unlimited!  Don't let the fuel run out or you will lose a life!  Run out of lives and the game ends!  There are some colored power-up coins to help you:

Red: Extra Life - Increments the number of lives you have

Orange: Shockwave Firing - Fires ammunition in a circle at 15-degree intervals

Yellow: Constant Fuel Level - The fuel level does not change if a ship passes through it

Green: Refill - Sets your gas to a full tank

Blue: Double Points - Doubles the amount of points you get for destroying a ship

Purple: Triple Points - Triples the amount of points you get for destroying a ship

***When I run the program, the coin for Triple Points rarely shows up.  I do not know why.***
